mapper.select: SELECT gs.standard_id,gs.standard_name,gs.standard_price, gs.standard_count FROM goods_standard gs WHERE gs.goods_id = #{goodsId}

SELECT gs.standard_id,gs.standard_name,gs.standard_price, IFNULL(( SELECT standard_count FROM qm_branch_goods WHERE standard_id = gs.standard_id AND branch_id = #{branchId}),0) standard_count FROM goods_standard gs WHERE gs.goods_id = #{goodsId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM goodsinfo gi INNER JOIN goods_standard gs ON gs.goods_id = gi.goods_id WHERE gi.my_team_id = #{myTeamId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qm_branch_goods (branch_id, goods_id, standard_id, standard_count) VALUES (#{branchId},#{goodsId},#{standardId},#{standardCount})
mapper.select: SELECT branch_id FROM qm_branch qb INNER JOIN user u ON u.team_department_id = qb.department_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT im.image_path FROM image_space im INNER JOIN goods_image gi ON gi.image_id = im.image_id WHERE gi.goods_img_type = 1 AND gi.goods_id = #{goodsId} LIMIT 1

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM goodsinfo gi LEFT JOIN goods_typeinfo gt ON gt.goods_type_id = gi.goods_type_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND gi.my_team_id = #{myTeamId} AND (gi.goods_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR gi.goods_code = #{keyword})

SELECT gi.goods_id,gi.goods_name,gi.goods_create_date, gi.goods_code, gt.goods_type_name goods_type FROM goodsinfo gi LEFT JOIN goods_typeinfo gt ON gt.goods_type_id = gi.goods_type_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND gi.my_team_id = #{branchVO.myTeamId} AND (gi.goods_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{branchVO.keyword},'%') OR gi.goods_code = #{branchVO.keyword}) LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
